Dependency Information

Apache Maven

<dependency>
  <groupId>com.randomnoun.maven.plugins</groupId>
  <artifactId>yaml-combine-maven-plugin</artifactId>
  <version>2.0.1</version>
  <type>maven-plugin</type>
</dependency>

Apache Buildr

'com.randomnoun.maven.plugins:yaml-combine-maven-plugin:maven-plugin:2.0.1'

Apache Ivy

<dependency org="com.randomnoun.maven.plugins" name="yaml-combine-maven-plugin" rev="2.0.1">
  <artifact name="yaml-combine-maven-plugin" type="maven-plugin" />
</dependency>

Groovy Grape

@Grapes(
@Grab(group='com.randomnoun.maven.plugins', module='yaml-combine-maven-plugin', version='2.0.1')
)

Gradle/Grails

compile 'com.randomnoun.maven.plugins:yaml-combine-maven-plugin:2.0.1'

Scala SBT

libraryDependencies += "com.randomnoun.maven.plugins" % "yaml-combine-maven-plugin" % "2.0.1"

Leiningen

[com.randomnoun.maven.plugins/yaml-combine-maven-plugin "2.0.1"]
